credits: The dad jokes were sources from: https://www.buzzfeed.com/mikespohr/29-dad-jokes-that-are-so-bad-their-actually-good
jokes: A ham sandwich walks into a bar and orders a beer. Bartender says, 'Sorry we don't serve food here.'
Why do chicken coops only have two doors? Because if they had four, they would be chicken sedans!
How do you make a Kleenex dance? Put a little boogie in it!
Two peanuts were walking down the street. One was a salted.
I used to have a job at a calendar factory but I got the sack because I took a couple of days off.
Two guys walk into a bar, the third one ducks.
I had a dream that I was a muffler last night. I woke up exhausted!

Why can't you hear a pterodactyl use the bathroom? Because the 'p' is silent.
quotes: Being a great father is like shaving. No matter how good you shaved today, you have to do it again tomorrow.
It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
yesorno: I'm your father, and I say, 'No way!'
Yeah sure [doesn't look up from television]
Why don't you ask your mother...
Now, I wouldn't be a good dad, or a good bot if I said yes to that...
You're old enough to decide for yourself on that one, aren't you?
Yes yes, but I don't want to hear any more about it!
Daddy's busy right now, go bug your mother!
